Description: Papyrus, written with black ink, legal document dated year 8 of Ptolemy IV Philopator - gift of land from father to son.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1990a / Catalogue of Demotic Papyri in the British Museum IV: Ptolemaic Legal Texts from the Theban Area (p.89-92, pl.75-7, 84)
